packs.pack_description: Places a border around ores for easier visibility within caves.
Places a border around Suspicious Sand and Suspicious Gravel for easier visibility.
Places a border around Budding Amethyst blocks for easier visibility within geodes.
Adds a border around Infested Stone in the inventory.
message: This will NOT affect the placed blocks.

packs.pack_description: Adds a border around Waxed Copper and variants in the inventory.
message: This will NOT affect the placed blocks.

packs.pack_description: Changes Melon and Pumpkin stems to reflect their fruit color.
Adds flowers to the top of kelp plants when they are fully grown. {age=25}.
Changes the breaking texture of blocks to a clean ring around the outside.
Gives all the Banner Pattern items unique and appropriate textures.
message: This pack exists as an archive and will not be updated with the 1.20.30 textures.

packs.pack_description: Displays hunger bar icons on all food names to show how much it will fill you up.
Displays the redstone power level on all Music Disc names.
Displays Slime on the sides of Sticky Pistons to allow players to easily differentiate them from regular pistons.
Changes the texture of Redstone Dust to a clean solid line.
Makes tripwire a bright blue so you can see them.
Adds North, East, South and West markings on the sides of the Lodestone, so you can use it as a stationary compass.
Modifies the note block pitch particle to show the pitch.
Translates the Roman Numerals for enchantments and potions to Arabic Numerals. (I, II, III -> 1, 2, 3).
Makes infested stone blocks appear crumbled and cracked, matching how easy it is to break the block.
Removes the bolts in the corner of Waxed Copper blocks and variants.
message: This does NOT change anything with Cut Copper, so Waxed Copper Items is recommended.

packs.pack_description: Adds a dot on the backside of the Piston and Sticky Piston to make the easier distinguishable.
Makes unlit Redstone Ore use the same palette as unlit Redstone Wire until its lit, when it then returns to its default, bright red colour.
Shows the empty and full honey stages in Bee Nests and Beehives on all sides.
Adds a border to buttons to make them noticeable.
Marks Pressure Plates with a square to make them noticeable.
Improves the bottom of specific blocks to make them identifiable
Shows a lit texture on all sides for furnaces, blast furncases and smokers.
Adds more textures to respawn anchors to indicate current charge.
Shows an open texture on all sides when barrel is open.
